content.name: p
children: Environment variables are supported by the
command. If the component has multiple containers, environment
variables are provisioned for each container.

children.name: Fence

attributes.title: Specifying environment variables for a container component

children:
schemaVersion: 2.2.0
metadata:
  name: mydevfile
components:
  - name: go
    container:
      image: golang
      memoryLimit: 512Mi
      mountSources: true
      command: ['sleep', 'infinity']
      env:
        - name: gopath
          value: $(PROJECTS_ROOT)/go
